name: European Recycling Platform SASU
goal: Manage compliance of Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) obligations for producers in 15 countries across Europe for WEEE, batteries and packaging.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Environment, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives:
Waste policy
Extended Producer Responsibility
WEEE directive
Battery Directive
Packaging Directive
Single-Use Plastics Directive
Waste Shipment Regulation
Chemical regulation
Environment
Plastic strategy
Ecodesign
